title: Brittany - Camping Milin Kerhe near Guingamp

posts.content:
Just recommended on Facebook:

If anyone is heading to Northern Brittany on holiday, I couldn't recommend Camping Milin Kerhe near Guingamp enough. We've just got back. Beautiful peaceful spot on a river by an old mill run by a very thoughtful couple Jonathan and Margareth. Look it up on the Cool Camping website. Be prepared for a lot of attention tho. The French are crazy for splits!
